== LWN Subscriptions for Ubuntu Members ==

Ubuntu members are entitled to a subscription to Linux Weekly News.

=== Process ===

# Apply for an account at <nowiki>[[https://lwn.net/newaccount|Linux Weekly News]]</nowiki>. If you have an existing account you can skip this step.
# Send a mail to michelle (at) canonical dot com (preferably using your ubuntu.com address) asking for a subscription sponsorship. This email MUST contain:
*** Your LWN username
*** Your Launchpad username.
# You will receive a mail when the subscription has been accepted.
# Enjoy LWN! (Read the <nowiki>[[http://lwn.net/op/FAQ.lwn|FAQ]]</nowiki>) 

=== Expiry ===

There is a high amount of requests for these accounts, so unused account subscriptions are disabled and given to someone else if they remained inactive for 5 months.  They can be enabled again, just email again per above when you next need it again.
